cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A bed in a Community Room offers security, comfort, and the chance to connect with fellow travelers. Youâ€™ll receive a twin size bed or bunk bed, an individual storage locker, and access to a shared bathroom.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 6 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A space for ladies to connect with fellow female travelers! Our Female Community Dorms are designed so you can enjoy a shared space with other women who also love traveling. Enjoy access to your own twin-size bunk bed, locker, and a shared bathroom.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Similar to a ship or train cabin, this is our most basic sleeping solution. Compact and modest, the micro twin room has two twin beds, and is perfect if youâ€™re looking for a place to sleep and a small area to store your belongings. Shared Bathroom.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 11th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 11th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
